posts.title: Germinal
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:In mid-nineteenth-century northern France, a coal mining town’s workers are exploited by the mine’s owner. One day, they decide to go on strike, and the authorities repress them.

posts._title: Lino Brocka – Tinimbang ka ngunit kulang AKA You Have Been Weighed and Found Wanting (1974)
posts.title: Tinimbang ka ngunit kulang
posts.excerpt: A portrait of small-town oppressiveness in the Philippines, made during the Marcos government’s imposition of martial law. Lino Brocka’s 1974 film tells of two social outcasts struggling to survive the hypocritical condemnation of their fellow villagers; the tone ranges from comedy to tragedy to documentary observation of village rituals.
posts.titleEnglish: You Have Been Weighed and Found Wanting

posts.title: Glimpse 2 (1990 – 2008)

posts.title: Zeit der Kannibalen
posts.excerpt: Öllers and Niederländer have everything under control. For the past six years, the two successful business consultants have been traveling through some of the seediest countries around the world in order to satisfy their clients’ greed.
